send(byte[], Delivery) - Method in interface jexxus.common.Connection
Sends the given data over this connection.
send(byte[], Delivery) - Method in class jexxus.server.ServerConnection
 
Server - Class in jexxus.server
Acts as a server for incoming client connections.
Server(ServerConnectionListener, int) - Constructor for class jexxus.server.Server
Creates a new server.
Server(ServerConnectionListener, int, int) - Constructor for class jexxus.server.Server
Creates a new server.

Note: The server will not begin listening for connections until startServer() is called.
ServerConnection - Class in jexxus.server
Represents a server's connection to a client.
ServerConnectionListener - Interface in jexxus.server
A class which implements this interface are able to control the events given off by the server.
shutdown(boolean) - Method in class jexxus.server.Server
After the server has shut down, no new client connections can be established.
size() - Method in class jexxus.common.ByteBuffer
 
startServer() - Method in class jexxus.server.Server
After the server has started, it is open for accepting new client connections.
